sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { 
    Wrapper,
    Container,
    InputsContainer,
    SearchBox,
    SearchInput,
    FilterSelect,
    FilterOption,
    SearchIcon, } from '../HomePage/style'
import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai'

function HomePage(props) {
    return (
       <Wrapper>
           <Container className ='container'>
                <InputsContainer>
                    <SearchBox>
                        <SearchIcon>
                            <AiOutlineSearch size = {22} color = {props.theme === 'dark' ? '#fff' : '#000'}/>
                        </SearchIcon>
                        <SearchInput placeholder = 'Search for a country ..'/>
                    </SearchBox>
                    <FilterSelect>
                        <FilterOption value ='africa'>Africa</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='americas'>Americas</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='asia'>Asia</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='europa'>Europa</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='oceania'>Oceania</FilterOption>
                    </FilterSelect>
                </InputsContainer>
           </Container>
       </Wrapper>
    )
}

export default HomePage
